name: Squids
body:
# Welcome to Squids.
Squids is an image data extraction open source framework.
Check out the code at http://github.com/squids/squids-core

# Phases
## Phase 1
Data extraction from image:
- EXIF information
  - date (day, month, year)
  - histogram classification
  - place - requires GPS position and 3rd. party systems

## Phase 2
- Organization of photos

## Phase 3
- Use of deep machine learn to improve organization and suggestion.

# Twitter
Follow the project at http://twitter.com/squidsapp

# Support or Contact
Contact info@squids.io and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.

## IRC
Drop on freenode.net channel #squids-app
